name: Homo Flimsy
detailed_description:
Humanity is evolving. It’s becoming more flexible.
Homo Flimsy, The Physics Based Ragdoll Athlete Simulator

Athletic performance has always pushed the boundaries of humans and our technologies. Through utilization of the Limberly range of A.G.I.L.E.S, members of elite sporting associations began realizing the potential that they could bring to their teams.

Homo Flimsy:


  • Henry the Goalkeeper and Laura the Dodgeballer require training, help them train through unique stages of their careers
  • Use unique abilities such as Slow Mo, Shrink and Shout to complete each stage of training
  • Visit varied training locations provided by Limberly Inc.
  • Ragdoll physics controls require both skill and luck
  • Play through the Campaign or the Free Play Mode
